summary: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.
cast: Golshifteh Farahani|Shahab Hosseini|Taraneh Alidoosti|Merila Zare'i|Mani Haghighi|Payman Maadi|Ra'na Azadivar|Ahmad Mehranfar|Saber Abar|Alireza Abbasi|Kamibekami|Mahshid Khosravi
